data.comment: The match has started.
Gamba takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 3, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Masaaki Toma has awarded Gamba a corner.
Throw-in for Gamba close to the penalty box.
In the minute 9, It's a goal kick for the home team in Suita.
Free kick Shimizu.
Shimizu's Shota Kaneko is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 12, Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Shimizu's Riyo Kawamoto misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 14, Throw-in high up the field for Shimizu in Suita.
Riyo Kawamoto for Shimizu is whistled offside.
Throw-in for Shimizu at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Gamba.
Kohei Okuno's header is off-target for Gamba.
Masaaki Toma awards Shimizu a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Gamba.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
Masaaki Toma signals a Gamba throw-in in Shimizu's half.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Shimizu in the half of Gamba.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Shimizu.
In the minute 27, Masaaki Toma signals a Gamba throw-in in Shimizu's half.
Throw-in Shimizu.
Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 29, Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Yuya Fukuda (Gamba) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 30, Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gamba are caught offside.
Can Shimizu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gamba's half?
In the minute 32, Masaaki Toma signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
Masaaki Toma awards the away team a throw-in.
Masaaki Toma signals a free kick to Shimizu.
In the minute 38, Gamba takes a corner from the right.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
In the minute 40, In Suita a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Shimizu have a goal kick.
Masaaki Toma signals a Shimizu throw-in in Gamba's half.
In the minute 42, Masaaki Toma has awarded Gamba a corner.
Shu Kurata of Gamba gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Shimizu at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 44, Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Masaaki Toma signals a throw-in for Gamba, close to Shimizu's area.
Masaaki Toma has awarded Gamba a corner.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Shimizu at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Shimizu takes a corner from the right.
Shimizu take a 0-1 lead thanks to Riyo Kawamoto.
In the minute 52, Shimizu drives forward and Kenta Nishizawa gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Gamba make their first substitution with Kazuma Watanabe replacing Hiroki Fujiharu.
In the minute 53, The home team replace Kohei Okuno with Shinya Yajima.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
Kim Young-Gwon of Gamba smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 55, Masaaki Toma awards the away team a throw-in.
Gamba drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Shimizu have a goal kick.
In the minute 59, Throw-in Gamba.
Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Shimizu needs to be cautious. Gamba have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Shimizu.
In the minute 61, The away team have replaced Yosuke Kawai with Mitsunari Musaka. This is the first substitution made today by Peter Cklamovski.
Tsuneyasu Miyamoto is making the team's third substitution at Panasonic Stadium Suita with Shuhei Kawasaki replacing Dai Tsukamoto.
In the minute 62, Gamba are pushing forward but Shu Kurata's finish is wide of the goal.
Masaaki Toma awards Shimizu a goal kick.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 63, Gamba's Kim Young-Gwon gets in a shot on goal at Panasonic Stadium Suita. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Shota Kaneko puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
Great play from Riyo Kawamoto to set up the goal.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
In Suita a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 71, Peter Cklamovski (Shimizu) is making a second substitution, with Yasufumi Nishimura replacing Kazunori Yoshimoto.
Masaaki Toma signals a free kick to Shimizu.
Shimizu's Kenta Nishizawa breaks free at Panasonic Stadium Suita. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 72, Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Shimizu.
Goal kick for Shimizu at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 76, Kenta Nishizawa (Shimizu) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Toma.
Shimizu have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 77, Kenta Nishizawa of Shimizu is pulled up for offside.
In Suita Gamba attack through Yuki Yamamoto. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Suita.
In the minute 80, Corner awarded to Gamba.
Kazuma Watanabe (Gamba) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Suita.
In the minute 81, Shoji Toyama is on a sub for Yuki Yamamoto for Gamba.
Jiro Nakamura is replacing Shu Kurata for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Masaaki Toma waits before resuming play because Yugo Tatsuta for Shimizu is still down.
In the minute 82, Takashi Kanai is replacing Ryo Okui for Shimizu at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Yuito Suzuki is replacing Yusuke Goto for the away team.
Shimizu’s Yugo Tatsuta is on his feet again at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 83, Throw-in Shimizu.
Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Toma.
In the minute 87, Masaaki Toma signals a Gamba throw-in in Shimizu's half.
Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Suita, Shinya Yajima (Gamba) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 89, Masaaki Toma awards Shimizu a goal kick.
Throw-in for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Shimizu have a goal kick.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
Shimizu's Elsinho gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Gamba defender.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Jiro Nakamura (Gamba) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
Patric (Gamba) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Shimizu at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Masaaki Toma awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Gamba.
Gamba's Jiro Nakamura misses with an attempt on goal.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Toma.
Ball safe as Shimizu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Masaaki Toma blows to end the match. The final score is 0-2.
